feature.label: org.antlr.ui
feature.description: This feature is an user interface for the ANTLR framework for constructing recognizers, compilers, and translators (http://www.antlr.org/). It consists of five plugins, two hold the ANTLR binaries and documentation, the others contain a compiler and an editor for ANTLR grammar files, and the ANTLR XML Support plugin.
